sense.gloss: that is so, that is right, it looks to me, that's my impression
people say that, it is said that, I hear that

sdata.j: ↑今日↑↓きょう↓は↑楽↑↓たの↓し|そうです|ね。
↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑時計↑↓とけい↓は↑高↑↓たか↓い|そうです|ね。
sdata.e: Your watch seems to be very valuable.

sdata.j: ↑我↑↓わ↓が↑家↑↓や↓はもう↑一↑↓いち↓↑人↑↓にん↓↑増↑↓ふ↓え|そうです|。
sdata.e: We are expecting an addition to our family.

sdata.j: ↑英語↑↓えいご↓を↑習↑↓なら↓っている|そうです|ね。
sdata.e: I hear you are taking English lessons.

sdata.j: ↑雲↑↓くも↓がだんだん↑黒↑↓くろ↓くなって、↑雨↑↓あめ↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓り|そうです|。
sdata.e: The clouds are getting darker; it's going to rain.

sdata.j: ↑噂↑↓うわさ↓だと↑彼↑↓かれ↓らはオーストラリアにいく|そうです|。
sdata.e: The scuttlebutt is they're going to Australia.

sdata.j: ↑雨↑↓あめ↓になり|そうです|。↑窓↑↓まど↓を↑閉↑↓し↓めたほうがいいでしょう。
sdata.e: It looks like rain. We had better shut the windows.

sdata.j: ↑雨↑↓あめ↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓り|そうです|ね。
sdata.e: I think it's going to rain.

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いち↓↑日↑↓にち↓いい↑天気↑↓てんき↓になり|そうです|よ。
sdata.e: I think it's going to be a nice day.
